# CHANGE THESE
# <name of world> Will set the name of the world when automatically generated and which world to load when started.
worldname=<name of world>
world=Worlds/<name of world>.wld

# <modpack name> Is just the name of the modpack you copy to your server directory. Make sure it is correctly named.
modpath=/server/ModPacks/<modpack name>/Mods/
modpack=/server/ModPacks/<modpack name>/Mods/enabled.json

# These settings can be changed. Uncomment a line to enable. Details are at https://terraria.wiki.gg/wiki/Server#Server_config_file
autocreate=2
#seed=
difficulty=0
maxplayers=8
port=7777
#password=
#motd=
#banlist=
#secure=1
language=en-US
#upnp=1
npcstream=15
priority=1

# DONT CHANGE THIS
worldpath=Worlds/
